name: Just Dance Summer Party
description:
Stoke the fire this summer with Just Dance Summer Party, a limited edition SKU with over 20 new tracks, including hit songs from Katy Perry, Rihanna, and Estelle featuring Kanye West. Just Dance Summer Party is the answer to Just Dance 2 fans who don’t have the capability to download content to their Wii units.

Features

• More hits: 23 new dances and songs
• Just Sweat: exercise in disguise
• Dance Party: the music and the party never stop
• Dance Battles: 4 player fun on the Wii
